lead_paragraph: European bonuses paid in 2015 were up 18 percent, according to a snapshot from the salary benchmarking website Emolument.com.

headline.main: Bank Bonuses Rise in Europe, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: Bank Bonuses Rise in Europe, Report Finds

snippet: European bonuses paid in 2015 were up 18 percent, according to a snapshot from the salary benchmarking website Emolument.com.
